articles.author: Amala Balakrishner
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets mostly rise after China keeps benchmark rates steady - CNBC
articles.description: The People's Bank of China expectedly kept its loan rates unchanged at 3.0% for the 1-year loan prime rate and 3.5% for the 5-year LPR.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets traded mixed Friday after China kept benchmark rates steady, while investors monitored escalating tensions between Israel and Iran.
U.S. President Donald Trump is now weighing w… [+1501 chars]
